22.17.0 + pnpm 10.22.0 to Bun 1.2.36 with full runtime replacement.

Core changes:
- .mise.toml: Add bun 1.2.36, remove node/pnpm pins
- package.json: Add engines.bun, workspaces field, downgrade Nx to 20.4.0 for @nx/bun plugin
- nx.json: Add @nx/bun plugin for Bun support
- Delete pnpm-workspace.yaml \(workspace config moved to package.json\)
- justfile: Replace all pnpm exec/npm with bunx/bun
- scripts/nx-agent-restart.sh: Use bunx instead of pnpm exec
- .github/workflows/nx-validate.yml: Use oven-sh/setup-bun@v2 action
- copier.yml: Add bun_version variable, remove pnpm_version, update nx_version
- tests: Update validation tests to check for bun instead of node/npm
- README.md, CLAUDE.md: Update setup instructions to use bun install/bunx

Remaining documentation files will be updated in follow-up commits.")
